citation: Proclamation under the Forest Practices Amendment Act 2019 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Forest Practices Amendment Act 2019

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Forest Practices Amendment Act 2019 fix 7 October 2019 as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence.

19 September 2019

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Resources

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 October 2019

This proclamation is administered by the Forest Practices Authority.
